definition: Han River (Hanshui)
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
man
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The River Han flows through Wuhan.
The detection and check calculations of Jiangjunhe River Cableway Bridge in Yunxi County are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹鄖西縣漢水將軍河索道橋的檢測與檢算。

sentences.english: But success comes down not to inspiration, but perspiration. Winston Churchill put it best
sentences.chinese: 但成功並不光是靈感閃現，而是努力和漢水。

sentences.english: Before the Western Zhou Dynasty, the connection between Huaihe River valley and the Hanshui River basin were not significant.
sentences.chinese: 西周以前，淮河流域和漢水流域間缺乏密切聯繫。

sentences.english: Wuhan lies here the Yangtze and the Han River meet.
sentences.chinese: 武漢位於長江和漢水匯合處。

sentences.english: Some folks do it with sweat and charm.
sentences.chinese: 有些人用漢水和魅力來賺錢。

sentences.english: Then Wang Ping crossed the river and submitted to Zhao Zilong, who took the defector to Xuande.
sentences.chinese: 王平渡漢水來投趙雲，雲引見玄德。

sentences.english: River Han basin performed an important function of linking up the northwest and middle south for a long time in history.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上漢水流域長期是溝通西北與中南的交通大動脈。

sentences.english: Wuhan is divided into three cities by the Changjang River and the Han River.
sentences.chinese: 武漢市被長江和漢水分成爲三個城市。

sentences.english: Wuhan lies where the Yangtze and the Han River meet.
sentences.chinese: 武漢位於長江和漢水匯合處。

sentences.english: Wang Ping described for him the geography of the Han River area.
